mapper.insert: insert into ULTAB_WM_CATE (ORG_ID, MERC_ID, CATE_ID, CATE_NAME, CATE_DESC, IMG_URL, IMG_HASH, IMG_ID, PRIORITY) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mercId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cateId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cateName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cateDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{imgHash,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{imgId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
